text:
First, I had a hard time opening it. Then, the mix came out in a cloud or lumps. I admit that I tried this after having a packet in my car for while but then it is made to travel, right?

The taste is OK but nothing exciting. If I thought about it, I could taste the tea and honey but mostly I tasted the sweet Kool-Aid type taste.

I was excited to find this as I cannot tolerate artificial sweetner. The sweetner (besides honey) is made from sugar but is low cal. I'm not sure how that is going to work for me.

Overall, not bad but not exciting.
